c74object.name: mb.plate~
c74object.digest: A physically modeled plate based on a waveguide mesh model.

method.name: midi-note
method.digest: Lists starting with a number trigger a new midi event.

method.name: hitColor
method.digest: The timbre of the impulse that is used to exite the mesh.

method.name: detune
method.digest: How much the mesh it detuned from the midi note's pitch.

method.name: resonance
method.digest: How highly tuned the modal filters. More resonance is less bandwidth.

method.name: brightness
method.digest: How much high frequencies are retained in the mesh
